nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures Annual 2018 is the first annual issue in the comic series Star Wars Adventures. The issue contains two stories, "Mind Your Manners" by John Jackson Miller, and "The Lost Eggs of Livorno" by Cavan Scott. The comic book was released by IDW Publishing on April 18, 2018.

With Leia injured, it's up to Luke to undertake a sensitive diplomatic mission with the easily irritated Sarkans! What should be a routine meeting soon turns into an action-packed adventure with the fate of the galaxy on the line!
